name: petio
tagline: A media request management tool integrated with Plex
description: Petio is a request management tool integrating with Plex and Overseerr to allow users to request media content. It automates approval workflows and supports multiple media backends.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Users can search and request movies or TV shows to be added to your Plex

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Configure automatic or manual approval processes for media requests based on user roles and quotas

features.title: User Management
features.description: Control access and permissions with user accounts, roles, and request limits for fair resource allocation

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Alert users when their requests are approved, denied, or available in the library

features.title: Search Integration
features.description: Search across multiple media databases to find and request content with metadata and artwork
